name: interface.server.gamepad
description: HID gamepad usage, designed to support interface.server but also working as a standalone library

scripts.test: echo "Test is setup for Logitech RumblePad 2 USB. Change tests/test.js for use with other joysticks" && node tests/test.js

author: Charlie Roberts <charlie@charlie-roberts.com> (http://www.charlie-roberts.com/)
